description: Three-Panel Screens (Paravent); Savonnerie Manufactory (French, active 1627 - present), Probably after cartoons by Jean-Baptiste Belin de Fontenay (French, 1653 - 1715), and Alexandre-François Desportes (French, 1661 - 1743); Savonnerie, France; 1714 to 1740; Wool and linen; cotton twill gimp; wooden interior frame; modern velvet lining; 273.6 × 194.2 cm (107 11/16 × 76 7/16 in.); 83.DD.260.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
